QuestData.Title: Ascendant Lord Obsidius
QuestData.Description: <Pip's helm buzzes.>$B$BGOOD GOLLY! Look at this place! A... Are those Deathwing's claw marks on the ceiling?! And what's that creature in the center of the chamber?$B$BI don't see Raz anywhere. Let's take care of this monster and find Raz!
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Once mortal, now an ascended elemental lord.
QuestData.RewardText: Poor Raz. He was the best friend a gnome ever had. At least we avenged his death and cleared out this hellish cavern!
